name: Pretty Pretty Pirates
description:
A local multiplayer, stop-motion-animated, war-strategy, dress-up game in which two crews of pirates break out into a fight regarding who is the most fashionable group.

Guide your characters to collect and equip clothes to increase how fashionable your crew is!

Click to select a character. Then click an item or location to move to.

Player 1 (yellow): Mouse
Player 2 (pink): Keyboard (WASD to move cursor, Space/Ctrl to click) or Controller (Left stick to move cursor, X or A to click)

A game by Judy Apple Kim and Matt Fabius

Post-jam update: fixed a game breaking bug in the Mac app
